Title: Icelandic Volcano
Plot: Jeremy wonders why there aren't more three-wheeled cars and investigates further with a closer look at the Reliant Robin. James drives the Toyota Hilux pickup up an active volcano in Iceland; and The Stig rips up the track in the new Bentley Continental Supersports.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Amy Williams, Johnny Vaughan, Peta Todd, Louie Spence, Nick Robinson, Al Murray, Peter Jones, Bill Bailey
